inscope.li: identification of the occurrence of a part version in a product structure;
>relationship of the occurrence of a part version with the definition of this part version it is derived from;
characterization of a part occurrence that is defined from a product specification;
characterization of the quantity of the part occurrence;

outscope.li: relationships with functions or alternative solution the part occurrence provides a solution element for;
description of the use case of a part occurrence in a product family;
